Murkrow (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0197: Umbreon
Pokémon
#0199: Slowking →
For Pokémon TCG Pocket cards, see Murkrow (TCG Pocket).

Murkrow has been featured on 24 different cards since it debuted in the Neo Genesis expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Murkrow cards are normally Darkness-type Basic Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Murkrow

Murkrow
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
